author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: Who Will Benefit From Federal Reserve's $2.3 Trillion Main Street Loans Program?
description: "Our country's highest priority must be to address this public health crisis, providing care for the ill and limiting the further spread of the virus," Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said in a statement.
content:
The Federal Reserve unveiled a historic $2.3 trillion plan on Thursday to aid businesses and state governments during the coronavirus pandemic.
The plan includes a boost to the Main Street business lending program, support for state governments and other ini… [+3273 chars]
